# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed with exceptional quality and functionality in mind. This item is not just any product; it's an investment in enhancing your daily life or work efficiency. Given its unique features and the effort put into its creation, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering all these aspects, I would like to propose a special introductory price of $120 for you. This offer includes a 30-day satisfaction guarantee, where you can return the product if it doesn't meet your expectations. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the benefits firsthand. Let me know what you think! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
